lead_paragraph: CAPE TOWN (Reuters - South Africa captain Adriaan Strauss underwent back surgery on Thursday and like Springbok winger Ruan Combrinck will miss the start of next year's Super Rugby competition.

headline.print_headline: Bok Captain Strauss Undergoes Back Operation
headline.main: Bok Captain Strauss Undergoes Back Operation
